phase_detector.name: Phase Detector
phase_detector.description:
This plugin allows to detect phase between two sources. For example, for
two or more microphones set at the different positions and distances from
the sound source. The internal algorithm is based on correlation function
calculation between two sources. Be aware: because there are many correlation
functions for different phases calculated at one time, the entire analyzing
process can take a lot of CPU resources. You can also reduce CPU utilization
by lowering the maximum analysis time. The plugin bypasses input signal without
any modifications, so it can be placed everywhere it's needed.
